quote: Spirituality is not about being God, but about being your self. God is an imagination. Self is already that - one with all and within all. Self is the essence l, the source and the manifestation too. What else is God?
author: Rashmit Kalra

quote: Tantra like any raw power is defined by the wisdom of its user
author: Anupama Garg

quote: I see the faces that stop by my cart here. Their smiles are hollow, their eyes are hungry. The yogi's faces are different. Silent, complete. Like the mountains around them. Asking no questions, seeking no answers, just certain, as though they knew exactly who they were.
author: Karan Bajaj, The Seeker

quote: For too many of us, it is only when adversity strikes that living for Christ becomes a priority: a sudden crisis such as a life-threatening illness, the death of a loved one, or the loss of a job or income reminds us that each day is precious, and only then do we begin to (re)evaluate our existence. But why is there no sense of urgency or accountability when God blesses us with an event that reveals the purpose of our soul?
author: Angela Monique Crudupt, Sent by Jesus: The Father sent Jesus, and Jesus sent you.
tags: god, hope, inspirational, purpose, spiritual-wisdom, spirituality

quote: If one is to live an abundant life. One must seek out all manner of ways to be challenged. Otherwise the fountain of the flow of life will only trickle in. One needs to perturbthe flow of life so as to engage it fully. Rich engagement is the fruit of enlightened labor of one’s passion by a sense of fulfillment.
author: Ivan Alexander Pozo-Illas, The Wayfarer of the Soul

quote: We are the authors, lovers, and dreamers of this Creation. What shall we create with our intentions?I hope as an entity soul that we as a collective overcome this strife we've brought down upon our heads. As anindividual entity within the macrocosm of God’s Spirit as the maker. Where it is stated, “This too shall pass and fade like the wind”. Only unconditional Love can spare us fromour self induced madness. That is the grace that God offers all life reborn onto itself. Be still and remember what it is to be Holy once more in the Love of God(dess). Amen.
author: Ivan Alexander Pozo-Illas, The Wayfarer of the Soul

quote: Wherever your love is, so is your heaven made manifest before your very eyes.
author: Ivan Alexander Pozo-Illas, The Wayfarer of the Soul

quote: For those who seek a lifestyle of meaning served by purpose than listen well. To live rightly is a grace fromGod(dess) of the Most High. Albeit it is not meant to be an easy feat either in its pursuit. To live a life of well being one must find a balance that is appropriate to one’s own purpose in life. Once found and understood correctly, then one can live by such a hallmark of fortitude. Otherwise one will wander far and wide in a haze of confusion not valuing themselves truly. Find your balance and it will lead you back to yourself and God(dess) awaiting you with open arms. Amen.
author: Ivan Alexander Pozo-Illas, The Wayfarer of the Soul

quote: To have the spirit of youth and the wisdom from age. Is to have used the eternal fountain of life within our very souls. Not for an instant but for a lifetime. Amen.
author: Ivan Alexander Pozo-Illas, The Wayfarer of the Soul

quote: Choose what will motivate you in life as a whole. Will it be Love or Fear that sets you apart in this lifetime? Karma has no hold on our souls greater than a love known as grace. Or a fear of sheer torment during this sojourn of our Earthly trek. If you choose poorly then you shall be preyed upon and easily manipulated by your peers via numerous tactics of hate at large. If again you choose wisely than keep on your guard using reason with an unconditional love. Because aconditional love is flawed as a mixture of demands placed on it by the frail ego always. It has no place being called love in the absolute eyes of God(dess).
author: Ivan Alexander Pozo-Illas, The Journey of the Soul Continues

quote: Of all the great and minor faiths as religions that have evolved over the ages with humanity. Many had their birth at the death or near death of another religious faith. One day the anthropological phenomena of our predominant faiths may become naturally forgotten, demonized, if notmorph into another religious tradition altogether. What we historically call as mythology is for Ancient Greece,Persia, or Mayan cultures were the Almighty religions of their age. So it will be again with our Epoch from today our renowned and accomplished heirs of thousands of years intoour combined futures. That will have regarded our present day Abrahamic traditions of Judaism, Christianity, and Islam as mythologies of their own future anthropological understanding.
author: Ivan Alexander Pozo-Illas

quote: A heart consumed by bitterness turns to stone.
author: Rona V Flynn

quote: If you practise deceit it will burrow down into dark places and change you. Spoken by Boaz to his daughter, Star.
author: Rona V. Flynn, Star's Awakening

quote: A heart consumed with bitterness will turn to stone. An old Lightkeepers adage, spoken by Boaz to Luka.
author: Rona V. Flynn, Star's Awakening

quote: Light makes light even brighter, but does not cancel it.
author: Steven Chopade

quote: I am the seeker, the act of seeking, and the one who is sought.
author: Karan Bajaj, The Seeker

quote: The departed souls shall never return.
author: Lailah Gifty Akita, Think Great: Be Great!
tags: christianity-faith, death-life-humor, death-note, death-of-a-loved-one, dying-last-words, graveyard, religion, souls, spiritual-sayings, spiritual-wisdom

quote: Don’t attempt to fight the enemy in your own strength. You will experience burnout, and you will fail. Don’t even think about it! The key is to engage in spiritual warfare God’s way. And that is by resting in him and fighting from victory, not for victory!
author: Pedro Okoro, The Ultimate Guide to Spiritual Warfare: Learn to Fight from Victory, Not for Victory!

quote: God isn’t asking you to fight the devil. He is asking you to simply uphold or sustain the victory won byJesus at Calvary and enforce his authority over the devil. You’re like the traffic warden who raises his hand and the vehicles stop. They don’t stop because he can physically bring thevehicles to a halt, but because he is representing and upholding the authority of the state.
author: Pedro Okoro, The Ultimate Guide to Spiritual Warfare: Learn to Fight from Victory, Not for Victory!

quote: You can exercise your authority as abeliever because you are seated with Jesus in the heavenly places.
author: Pedro Okoro, The Ultimate Guide to Spiritual Warfare: Learn to Fight from Victory, Not for Victory!

quote: Generosity is inverted prosperity.
author: Matshona Dhliwayo

quote: Do you wish to take control of your life? Begin by focusing on steering the storm, rather than where the lightening strikes.
author: Gary   Hopkins
tags: control, empowerment, enlightenment, higher-self, self-empowerment, self-mastery, self-realization, spiritual-wisdom, wisdom

quote: Dispassion doesn't mean to no longer feel the passions, but to no longer accept them.
author: Isaac of Nineveh, The Ascetical Homilies of Saint Isaac the Syrian

quote: Take death for example. A great deal of our effort goes into avoiding it. We make extraordinary efforts to delay it, and often consider its intrusion a tragic event. Yet we’d find it hard to live without it. Death gives meaning to our lives. It gives importance and value to time. Time would become meaningless if there were too much of it.
author: Ray Kurzweil

quote: Lordship and rapport are the keys to save us from being combative and make us more attractive in spiritual conversations.
author: Gary Rohrmayer, Spiritual Conversations: Creating and Sustaining Them Without Being a Jerk
tags: evangelical, evangelism, pastor, pastors, spiritual-insights, spiritual-wisdom

quote: Seek to be served, and you become a servant. Seek to serve others, and you become a master.
author: Donald L. Hicks, Look into the stillness

quote: Yes, it is true that beauty is only skin deep, and internal loveliness resonates to the outside; but deep down inside every woman secretly longs to possess the allure of a royal queen.
author: Terry A. O'Neal
tags: beauty, beauty-queens, poetry-life, spiritual-wisdom, taoneal, women-s-strength

quote: Whenever you receive a vision, quickly act on the vision.
author: Lailah Gifty Akita, Think Great: Be Great!
tags: dreams-quotes, journey-of-life, journey-quotes, spiritual-insights, spiritual-wisdom, spirituality, vision, visions-in-life

quote: We are all touched by music. Music connects us.
author: Awen Finn, Read my SONG Read my HEART Read my SOUL

quote: We must manifest the glory of God on earth.
author: Lailah Gifty Akita, Think Great: Be Great!

quote: May the love at Christmas be with us throughout coming year.
author: Lailah Gifty Akita, Think Great: Be Great!

quote: Music connects us to freedom
author: Awen Finn, Read my SONG Read my HEART Read my SOUL

quote: If you listen to the beginning of the whispers you will not have to hear the shouts.
author: Miranda J. Barrett, A Woman's Truth: A Life Truly Worth Living

quote: God is the source of life, honour and wealth.
author: Lailah Gifty Akita, Think Great: Be Great!

quote: Jesus told you all that I hid the spiritual wisdom from the mind and thus it could only be accessed from the heart. And yet men become “learned” in the Bible and study and pull it apart and attempt to put it back together again. Just like the old nursery rhyme of Humpty Dumpty, “All the King’s horses and all the King’s men could not put Humpty Dumpty back together again.” My words cannot be put together again. My word cannot be “put together” by the mind of any man. This is why I gave the New Covenant. It was and is My promise to guide those who wander, home again unto My heart.
author: Debra Clemente, Listen Hear: A Divine Love Story

quote: Find yourself, and once you do never let go
author: Coach Cassandra

quote: In everyone's mind there is a whisper of the next step. It may be simple, such as making a phone call or reading a book. It may be a very concrete, mundane step to take that may not even seem connected with your higher vision. Know that you are always being shown the next step; it is always something that comes to your mind as obvious, simple, and a joyful thing to do
author: Sanaya Roman, Living with Joy: Keys to Personal Power and Spiritual Transformation

quote: Lao Tzu "The key to growth is the introductionof higher dimensions of consciousnessinto our awareness.
author: Lao Tzu

quote: Life should be touched, not strangled.
author: Ray Bradbury

quote: The Bible is not a tested hypothesis, it is not a theory but it is God's Breath.
author: Moroaswi Tumiso Victor, Divine (Godhead) Principles: Christ Alive in You

quote: There are times in life when one is in the trough of the wave, and other times when the blessings of the Eternal One wash over us like waves.A Letter to GodPage 85
author: Antoine D. Ongolo, A Letter to God

quote: It doesn't seem to make any sense, but then it never does! It's usually only afterwards when the pieces finally fit together, that you're left standing there thinking how obvious it always was.
author: Michelle Frost, Wisdoms of the Light

quote: The dreams of a pure life,The dreams of a loving wife,Find pleasure in a Godly life.
author: The Wife S.R.

quote: Those who consider the inessential to be essential And see the essential as inessential Don't reach the essential, Living in the field of wrong intention
author: Gautama Buddha, The Dhammapada

quote: Baptized in a river when I was a teenager. I go to church most Sundays. My favorite Bible verse is ‘Jesus wept.’”“Because it’s the shortest?” He almost smiled.“No. Because it says that Jesus knew what it meant to grieve. He’d just let his best friend in the world die of illness when he could have gotten there in time to save him. I’m thinking he was between a rock and hard place, and the hard place let his friend die. He grieved. Then, when he could, he went and raised his friend from the grave, and he knew that if he did that, he’d die himself.
author: Faith Hunter, Blood Trade

quote: the starting point of all achievement is desire
author: Napoleon Hill, Napoleon Hill's Keys to Success: The 17 Principles of Personal Achievement

quote: Liberty does not mean doing as you like, it means liking as you ought, and doing that.(From Slave)
author: John F. MacArthur Jr.

quote: The ideas of the moral order and of God belong to the ineradicable substrate of the human soul.
author: C.G. Jung, Dreams

quote: Christ in you is the hope of glory..." "Your life moves in the direction of your most dominant thought" "Love is never unsure" "Truth demands a response
author: Various

quote: You are never listening to what someone is saying, you are only ever listening to what you are hearing
author: Julia Heywood

quote: We are never so free as when we own our sacred serfdom...
author: Charles Haddon Spurgeon

quote: The moment you are there You know but the moment cannot be explained for it is beyond language and expression. It is a moment of silence, joy, bliss, void, crying, dancing but nothing confirms to normal.
author: Maitreya Rudrabhayananda

quote: Cultivate the habit of being grateful for every good thing that comes to you, and to give thanks continuously. And because all things have contributed to your advancement, you should include all things in your gratitude.
author: Ralph Waldo Emerson

quote: Let gratitude be the pillow upon which you kneel to say your nightly prayer. And let faith be the bridge you build to overcome evil and welcome good.
author: Maya Angelou, Celebrations: Rituals of Peace and Prayer

quote: Acknowledging the good that you already have in your life is the foundation for all abundance.
author: Eckhart Tolle, A New Earth: Awakening to Your Life's Purpose

quote: We must find time to stop and thank the people who make a difference in our lives.
author: John F. Kennedy

quote: Gratitude is not only the greatest of virtues, but the parent of all others.
author: Marcus Tullius Cicero

quote: Appreciation is a wonderful thing. It makes what is excellent in others belong to us as well.
author: Voltaire

quote: As we express our gratitude, we must never forget that the highest appreciation is not to utter words, but to live by
author: John F. Kennedy

quote: In normal life we hardly realize how much more we receive than we give, and life cannot be rich without such gratitude. It is so easy to overestimate the importance of our own achievements compared with what we owe to the help of others.
author: Dietrich Bonhoeffer, Letters and Papers from Prison

quote: We should certainly count our blessings, but we should also make our blessings count.
author: Neal A. Maxwell

quote: The highest tribute to the dead is not grief but gratitude.
author: Thornton Wilder

quote: And when you crush an apple with your teeth, say to it in your heart:Your seeds shall live in my body,And the buds of your tomorrow shall blossom in my heart,And your fragrance shall be my breath,And together we shall rejoice through all the seasons.
author: Kahlil Gibran

quote: The unthankful heart discovers no mercies; but the thankful heart will find, in every hour, some heavenly blessings.
author: Henry Ward Beecher

quote: It is a pity that doing one's best does not always answer.
author: Charlotte Brontë, Jane Eyre

quote: Gratitude can transform common days into thanksgivings, turn routine jobs into joy, and change ordinary opportunities into blessings.” —
author: William Arthur Ward

quote: Not what we say about our blessings, but how we use them, is the true measure of our thanksgiving.
author: W.T. Purkiser

quote: The miracle is not to walk on water. The miracle is to walk on the green earth, dwelling deeply in the present moment and feeling truly alive.
author: Thich Nhat Hanh

quote: God gave you a gift of 86 400 seconds today. Have you used one to say thank you
author: William Arthur Ward

quote: Feeling gratitude and not expressing it is like wrapping a present and not giving it.
author: William Arthur Ward

quote: In ordinary life we hardly realize that we receive a great deal more than we give, and that it is only with gratitude that life becomes rich.
author: Dietrich Bonhoeffer

quote: The greatest wisdom is in simplicity. Love, respect, tolerance, sharing, gratitude, forgiveness. It's not complex or elaborate. The real knowledge is free. It's encoded in your DNA. All you need is within you. Great teachers have said that from the beginning. Find your heart, and you will find your way.
author: Carlos Barrios, Mayan elder and Ajq'ij of the Eagle Clan

quote: My gratitude for good writing is unbounded
author: I’m grateful for it the way I’m grateful for the ocean.
tags: Anne Lamott, Bird by Bird: Some Instructions on Writing and Life

quote: Whatever you appreciate and give thanks for will increase in your life.
author: Sanaya Roman, Living with Joy: Keys to Personal Power and Spiritual Transformation

quote: Breath is the finest gift of nature. Be grateful for this wonderful gift.
author: Amit Ray, Beautify your Breath - Beautify your Life
tags: breath, breathe, breathing, breathing-awareness, breathing-exercise, gift, gifts-from-heaven, gratitude, gratitude-happiness-inner-peace, gratitude-quotes, gratitude-works, gratitudes, inner-peace, mindful-breathing, mindfulness, mindfulness-meditation, mindfulness-practice, supreme-love

quote: Take full account of what Excellencies you possess, and in gratitude remember how you would hanker after them, if you had them not.
author: Marcus Aurelius, Meditations

quote: Gratitude is the ability to experience life as a gift. It liberates us from the prison of self-preoccupation.
author: John Ortberg, When the Game Is Over, It All Goes Back in the Box

quote: My gratitude to him is as boundless as the Pacific ocean.
author: Yann Martel, Life of Pi

quote: Be thankful for your allotment in an imperfect world.  Though better circumstances can be imagined, far worse are nearer misses than you probably care to realize.
author: Richelle E. Goodrich, Smile Anyway
tags: appreciation, gratefulness, gratitude, richelle, richelle-goodrich, thankfulness, thanks

quote: Every once in a while God allows you to stub your toe as a kind reminder to be grateful for the miraculous body attached to it.
author: Richelle E. Goodrich, Smile Anyway

quote: For each new morning with its light,For rest and shelter of the night,For health and food, for love and friends,For everything Thy goodness sends.
author: Ralph Waldo Emerson

quote: When it comes to life the critical thing is whether you take things for granted or take them with gratitude.
author: G.K. Chesterton

quote: Eucharisteo—thanksgiving—always precedes the miracle.
author: Ann Voskamp, One Thousand Gifts: A Dare to Live Fully Right Where You Are

quote: When it was done and I went to sleep, I lay awake and listened to the clock on your nightstand and the wind outside and understood that I was really home, that in bed with you was home, and something that had been getting close in the dark was suddenly gone. It could not stay. It had been banished. It knew how to come back, I was sure of that, but it could not stay and I could really go to sleep. My heart cracked with gratitude. I think it was the first gratitude I’ve ever really known. I lay there beside you and the tears rolled down the sides of my face and onto the pillow. I loved you then and I love you now and I have loved you every second in between. I don’t care if you understand me. Understanding is vastly overrated, but nobody ever gets enough safety. I’ve never forgotten how safe I felt with that thing gone out of the darkness.
author: Stephen King, Lisey's Story

quote: Courtesies of a small and trivial character are the ones which strike deepest in the grateful and appreciating heart.
author: Henry Clay

quote: I was so happy to be out of there. “Barabas, if you weren’t battingfor the other team, I’d marry you.”He grinned. “If I weren’t batting for the other team, I would accept yourproposal. You had me at ‘No comment.’ If all my clients were this smart, mylife would be much easier. Much, much easier.
author: Ilona Andrews, Gunmetal Magic

quote: I truly believe we can either see the connections, celebrate them, and express gratitude for our blessings, or we can see life as a string of coincidences that have no meaning or connection.For me, I’m going to believe in miracles, celebrate life, rejoice in the views of eternity and hope my choices will create a positive ripple effect in the lives of others. This is my choice.
author: Mike Ericksen, Upon Destiny's Song
tags: blessings, celebrate, choice, eternity, gratitude, life-meaning, miracle, ripple-effects, service

quote: Gratitude paints little smiley faces on everything it touches.
author: Richelle E. Goodrich, Smile Anyway
tags: appreciation, gratefulness, gratitude, richelle, richelle-goodrich, smile, thankfulness

quote: If we want to keep the blessings of life coming to us, we must learn to be grateful for whatever is given.
author: Harold Klemp, The Language of Soul: Keys to Living a More Meaningful Life

quote: Gratitude helps you to grow and expand
author: gratitude brings JOY and laughter into your life and into the lives of all those around you.

quote: Steam seems to have killed all gratitude in the hearts of sailors.
author: Jules Verne, Twenty Thousand Leagues Under the Sea

quote: If I do not feel a sense of joy in God's creation, if I forget to offer the world back to God with thankfulness, I have advanced very little upon the Way. I have not yet learnt to be truly human. For it is only through thanksgiving that I can become myself.
author: Kallistos Ware, The Orthodox Way

quote: Be happy, noble heart, be blessed for all the good thou hast done and wilt do hereafter, and let my gratitude remain in obscurity like your good deeds.
author: Alexandre Dumas, The Count of Monte Cristo

quote: Gratitude for the seemingly insignificant—a seed—this plants the giant miracle.
author: Ann Voskamp, One Thousand Gifts: A Dare to Live Fully Right Where You Are
tags: giant, gratitude, insignificant, miracle, plant, seed

quote: I have learned over a period of time to be almost unconsciously grateful--as a child is--for a sunny day, blue water, flowers in a vase, a tree turning red. I have learned to be glad at dawn and when the sky is dark. Only children and a few spiritually evolved people are born to feel gratitude as naturally as they breathe, without even thinking. Most of us come to it step by painful step, to discover that gratitude is a form of acceptance.
author: Faith Baldwin, Many Windows, Seasons of the Heart

quote: Gratitude is an overflow of the pleasure filling your soul.
author: Raheel Farooq

quote: Most of us forget to take time for wonder, praise and gratitude until it is almost too late. Gratitude is a many-colored quality, reaching in all directions. It goes out for small things and for large; it is a God-ward going.
author: Faith Baldwin, Many Windows, Seasons of the Heart

quote: Thanksgiving for God’s faithfulness in our pain is the indisputable proof that we believe God is a part of our pain.
author: Erwin W. Lutzer, When You've Been Wronged: Moving From Bitterness to Forgiveness

quote: Superficial social niceties are far different from the deep emotion of thanksgiving.
author: Alexandra Katehakis, Mirror of Intimacy: Daily Reflections on Emotional and Erotic Intelligence

quote: Summoning gratitude is a sure way to get our life back on track. Opening our eyes to affirm gratitude grows the garden of our inner abundance, just as standing close to a fire eventually warms our heart.
author: Alexandra Katehakis, Mirror of Intimacy: Daily Reflections on Emotional and Erotic Intelligence

quote: I have come to realize that truly rich people are rich not because they are frugal or they chose to be frugal, but because they are so grateful, contented and full of self-worth that they don't have to prove anything to anyone with material possessions. This way, they appear frugal.
author: Jan Mckingley Hilado, Rich Real Radical: 40 Lessons from a Magna Cum Laude and a College Drop Out

quote: Are you thankful for not being young?''Yes, sir. If I was young, it would all have to be gone through again, and the end would be a weary way off, don't you see?...
author: Charles Dickens, Our Mutual Friend

quote: Beth ceased to fear him from that moment, and sat there talking to him as cozily as if she had known him all her life, for love casts out fear, and gratitude can conquer pride.
author: Louisa May Alcott

quote: When you focus on gratitude, positive things flow in more readily, making you even more grateful.
author: Lissa Rankin, Mind Over Medicine: Scientific Proof That You Can Heal Yourself

quote: When my parents were liberated, four years before I was born, they found that the ordinary world outside the camp had been eradicated. There was no more simple meal, no thing was less than extraordinary: a fork, a mattress, a clean shirt, a book. Not to mention such things that can make one weep: an orange, meat and vegetables, hot water. There was no ordinariness to return to, no refuge from the blinding potency of things, an apple screaming its sweet juice.
author: Anne Michaels, Fugitive Pieces

quote: I made cranberry sauce, and when it was done put it into a dark blue bowl for the beautiful contrast. I was thinking, doing this, about the old ways of gratitude: Indians thanking the deer they'd slain, grace before supper, kneeling before bed. I was thinking that gratitude is too much absent in our lives now, and we need it back, even if it only takes the form of acknowledging the blue of a bowl against the red of cranberries.
author: Elizabeth Berg, Open House

quote: What well-bred woman would refuse her heart to a man who had just saved her life? Not one
author: and gratitude is a short cut which speedily leads to love.

quote: All sanity depends on this: that it should be a delight to feel the roughness of a carpet under smooth soles, a delight to feel heat strike the skin, a delight to stand upright, knowing the bones are moving easily under the flesh.
author: Doris Lessing, The Golden Notebook

quote: That's the funny thing about America--the blessed thing. As many people as there are to hold you back, there are angels whose humanity makes up for all the others. I've had my share of angels.
author: Abraham Verghese, Cutting for Stone

quote: For a wise man, I have been told, once said, ‘Gratitude is best and most effective when it does not evaporate in empty phrases.’ But alas, my lady, I am but a mass of empty phrases, it would seem.
author: Isaac Asimov, Foundation and Empire

quote: After the fire, when I'd tried to express my gratitude for their kindness to our customers, they'd been awkward, uncomfortable. My father had had to explain to me that giving thanks is not a common practice in India.'Then how do you know if people appreciated what you did?' I'd asked.'Do you really need to know?' my father had asked back.
author: Chitra Banerjee Divakaruni, Queen of Dreams

quote: The soul that gives thanks can find comfort in everything
author: the soul that complains can find comfort in nothing.

quote: If you imagine that I have the smallest desire to receive your hand as a reward for having performed a difficult task to your satisfaction you're beside the bridge, my child! I've no fancy for a reluctant wife. I want your love, not your gratitude.
author: Georgette Heyer, Black Sheep

quote: Thanksgiving creates abundance.
author: Ann Voskamp

quote: When I think of how many people in this world have it worse than I do, I realize just how blessed I really am...... and I have to give thanks ...
author: Shannan Lea, Eish! London

quote: Life-changing gratitude does not fasten to a life unless nailed through with one very specific nail at a time.
author: Ann Voskamp

quote: When the gratitude of many to one throws away all shame, we behold fame.
author: Friedrich Nietzsche, The Gay Science

quote: Rather than getting more spoilt with age, as difficulties pile up, epiphanies of gratitude abound.
author: Alain de Botton

quote: Every morning when I wake up, I kiss her forehead as symbol of gratitude and appreciation and she repays me back with a lovely smile.
author: M.F. Moonzajer, A moment with God ; Poetry
tags: appreciation, crazy-love, forehead, gratitude, kiss, lovely, smile, symbol

quote: [He was aware] of the value of the word of praise dropped at exactly the right moment
author: and he would have thought himself extremely stupid to withhold what cost him so little and was productive of such desirable results.

quote: Though they only take a second to say, thank yous leave a warm feeling behind that can last for hours.
author: Kent Allan Rees, Molly Withers and the Golden Tree

quote: What can we make of the inexpressible joy of children? It is a kind of gratitude, I think—the gratitude of the ten-year-old who wakes to her own energy and the brisk challenge of the world. You thought you knew the place and all its routines, but you see you hadn’t known. Whole stacks at the library held books devoted to things you knew nothing about. The boundary of knowledge receded, as you poked about in books, like Lake Erie’s rim as you climbed its cliffs. And each area of knowledge disclosed another, and another. Knowledge wasn’t a body, or a tree, but instead air, or space, or being—whatever pervaded, whatever never ended and fitted into the smallest cracks and the widest space between stars.
author: Annie Dillard, An American Childhood
tags: awe, childhood, gratitude, joy, knowledge, memoir, wonder

quote: I try hard to hold fast to the truth that a full and thankful heart cannot entertain great conceits. When brimming with gratitude, one’s heartbeat must surely result in outgoing love, the finest emotion we can ever know.
author: Bill W.

quote: Be grateful for whatever it is that opens you up.
author: Allan G. Hunter

quote: Gratitude is a form of worship in its own right, as it implies the acceptance of a power greater than yourself.
author: Stephen Richards

quote: Thanks, Pepe. You've put an extra night into my life. I would have spent it just sleeping like an ox, but I've lived it instead. I'm grateful.
author: Manuel Vázquez Montalbán, La Soledad Del Manager

quote: Saying that 'I am a grateful alcoholic' will then reflect the truth about who we have become in our person, having understood deeply and intimately that God in his grace can turn any evil, any pain we have suffered or inflicted, to good purpose. – p. 57
author: Ray A., Practice These Principles: Living the Spiritual Disciplines and Virtues in 12-Step Recovery to Achieve Spiritual Growth, Character Development, and Emotional Sobriety

quote: Always remember that with privilege comes responsibility. You must go to Casa Azul and see the place you came from. Only then will you be able to understand how far you've come.
author: Sandra Rodriguez Barron, Stay with Me: A Novel

quote: Getting to the destination you desire involves walking in the right direction. You can't board a jet to enlightenment, and thank God for that. Otherwise, when you jumped off the plane, you'd proceed to polluting paradise with the hell that you thought you had left behind.
author: Natalie Pace, The Gratitude Game: 21 Days to a Healthier, Wealthier, More Beautiful You

quote: When we flood our creative problem-solving mind with the endorphins of gratitude, we are open to receiving the spectacular solutions that are needed now to ensure that generations to come will enjoy this beautiful blue ball that we call home.
author: Natalie Pace, The Gratitude Game: 21 Days to a Healthier, Wealthier, More Beautiful You
tags: clean-energy, climate-change, conservation, gratitude, green, natalie-pace, solar, sustainability

quote: Gratitude for me is waking up each day, and being able to make a difference in somebody’s life.
author: Charmaine J Forde

quote: I know I should be reassuring him that everything's all right, that he needn't worry, but I can't. Instead I'm talking to someone I don't know who isn't even there. Thank you, I'm saying. Thank you for Lucy, thank you for Claire and for Daniel, thank you for this cold and this blood and this pain. Thank you. Thank you. Thank you.
author: Michael Dibdin, Thanksgiving

quote: True heartfelt gratitude offers moments of profound reflection, on the blessings which constantly fill our lives (KR, 1998)
author: Kieran Revell, The Unstoppable Power Within: Imagine the Possibilities

quote: Treasure the magic moments for the gems they are.
author: Catherine Marie Bergman

quote: To be content is to count your blessings.
author: Lailah Gifty Akita

quote: gratitude is a duty which ought to be paid but which none have a right to expect
author: Rousseau Jean-Jacques 1712-1778

quote: Thank God, thank God.
author: Lailah Gifty Akita

quote: Be generous with praise and kind words of encouragement. Say “thank you” when someone helps you. Make colleagues feel welcome when they call or stop to talk with you. If you let others know that they are appreciated, they’ll want to give you their best.
author: Del Suggs, Truly Leading: Lessons in Leadership

quote: A sprinkle of magic, a ton of fun, a heap of optimism, a lot of joy, a glimmer of hope – ’tis the gift of the Happy Rosy Day gratitude journal.
author: Zakiyya Rosebelle

quote: Gratitude is the language of love.
author: Clifton L. West III

quote: If we can realize that life is always happening for us, not to us… game over, all the pain and suffering disappears.
author: Tony Robbins

quote: Just remember to say THANK YOU sometimes, for all of these everyday extraordinary gifts.
author: Scott Stabile

quote: Thinking too much just brings it back to me, me, me—but thanking takes my eyes off myself and my mistakes and puts them on others, on things bigger than myself. I can’t stand here very long without being humbled at how small I am and amazed at how big and beautiful our world is.
author: Elizabeth Musser, Words Unspoken

quote: Be encouraged. Hold your head up high and know God is in control and has a plan for you. Instead of focusing on all the bad, be thankful for all the good.
author: Germany Kent
tags: be-thankful, be-thankful-for-each-day, be-thankful-for-what-you-have, be-thankful-for-your-life, be-thankful-to-be-alive, focus-on-the-good, focus-on-the-positive, germany-kent, germany-kent-quote, germany-kent-quotes, god-is-in-control, god-is-in-control-of-everything, god-is-with-you, god-s-will, gods-power, grace-of-god, grateful-attitude, grateful-heart, grateful-quotes, gratefulness-quotes, gratitude, gratitude-happiness-inner-peace, gratitude-is-a-choice, gratitude-life-happiness-success, gratitude-quotes, hold-your-head-up, hope-guru, the-hope-guru

quote: She could go on asking herself why roses had thorns or she could be thankful that thorns had roses.
author: Ella Griffin, The Flower Arrangement

quote: The smaller the item of gratitude, the purer is the connection to our heart.
author: H.L. Balcomb, Cinderella In Focus: "Curiosity is the doorway to our personal possibility!" 2nd Edition coming Oct.  31, 2017

quote: We seldom think of what we have but always of what we lack
author: Schopenhauer Arthur Schopenhauer Et Al

quote: It is easy to say I am thankful for the sweet and beautiful things in life: flower gardens, ice cream cones, diamond rings, dances under moonlight, children’s laughter, birdsongs, and the like. The challenge is recognizing things of value in the dark, sour, uglier parts of life. But if you look hard enough, you will find that even tough times offer pearls worthy of gratitude.
author: Richelle E. Goodrich, Slaying Dragons
tags: be-thankful, grateful, gratitude, richelle, richelle-e-goodrich, richelle-goodrich, thankful, thankfulness, thanks

quote: Love is prayerfulness groping toward godliness. Love is poetry born out of the sheer joy of being. Love is song, dance, celebration: a song of gratitude, a dance of thankfulness, celebration for no reason at all, for this tremendous gift that goes on showering on us, for this whole universe, from the dust to the divine.
author: Osho, The Power of Love
tags: celebration, dance, gift, godliness, gratitude, love, poetry

quote: As long as I live, I can only be grateful.
author: Lailah Gifty Akita

quote: Life is a gift. Live it with gratitude.
author: Lailah Gifty Akita

quote: As long as we are grateful, we shall be glad.
author: Lailah Gifty Akita

quote: Life is not so bad after all when you can breathe.
author: Boniface Sagini, Thrills and Chills: Trudging Through Life

quote: Find much to be grateful for in every day. Doing so will not only enrich your life, it will bless those around you in ways you may never know.
author: Richelle E. Goodrich, Slaying Dragons
tags: bless-others, blessings, grateful, gratitude, richelle, richelle-e-goodrich, richelle-goodrich, thankfulness

quote: Gratitude possesses all the energy of a sunbeam. That is how it makes life blossom.
author: Richelle E. Goodrich, Slaying Dragons
tags: be-grateful, gratefulness, gratitude, richelle, richelle-e-goodrich, richelle-goodrich

quote: Night helps us appreciate daylight, while lengthy days make us yearn for a good stretch of night.
author: Richelle E. Goodrich, Slaying Dragons
tags: appreciation, daylight, gratitude, nigh, night-and-day, richelle, richelle-e-goodrich, richelle-goodrich

quote: Seek the good in life and life will be good to you.
author: Jenni Young

quote: Think not so much of what you lack as of what you have: but of the things that you have, select the best, and then reflect on how eagerly you would have sought them if you did not have them.
author: Marcus Aurelius, Meditations

quote: When you feel thankful, you can be appreciative for a moment, then not at all the next. It seems the tank is full, then it becomes empty, and the cycle continues. If you don't feel the same gratitude for a moment, know that it's possible in the next moment that comes around.
author: J.R. Rim
tags: appreciate, appreciative, around, being, cycle, feel, feeling, full-empty, grateful, gratitude, state, tank, thank, thank-god, thank-you, thankful

quote: Gratitude will make you feel great, choose to be grateful.
author: Gift Gugu Mona

quote: Gratitude houses plenitude amidst scarcity.
author: Sravani Saha Nakhro

quote: Loyalty starts with a demonstration of respect and gratitude.
author: Chip Bell

quote: If you woke up tomorrow to only the things you've expressed your gratitude for today, then what would be missing from your life in the morning?
author: Nanette Mathews

quote: I choose to say it is well even when it is not, because in every situation I find myself in, I still learn from it.
author: Gift Gugu Mona
tags: choose, gratitude, happy-endings, learn, situation, well

quote: In an expression of attitude or building character, we forgot real gratitude. In an artificial expression, we lost our real identity and longing to become something, it's never ending process. So, are you willing to look inside? And take the journey from attitude to gratitude.
author: Abhinav Rajput

quote: And now in my tenderness of remembering it all again, I think I am still there with him too. I am there with all the others, most of them gone but some who are still here, who gave me love and called forth love from me. When I number them over, I am surprised how many there are. And so I have to say that another of the golden threads is gratitude.I was grateful because I knew, even in my fear and grief, that my life had been filled with gifts.
author: Wendell Berry, Hannah Coulter

quote: The older I get, the more I seem to be able to appreciate my "neighbor" (whomever I happen to be with at the moment). Oh, sure, I've always tried to love my neighbor as myself; however, the more experiences I've had, the more chances I've had to see the uniqueness of each person... as well as each tree, and plant, and shell, and cloud... the more I find myself delighting every day in the lavish gifts of God, whom I've come to believe is the greatest appreciator of all.
author: Fred Rogers, The World According to Mister Rogers: Important Things to Remember

quote: Tea- The sweetness of love,The fragrance of flowers,The comfort of a friend,The warmth of a hug-Such great delight gingerly poured from a single pink teapot.
author: Zakiyya Rosebelle, The Happy Rosy Day Book, Happiness Blossoms: A Keepsake Gratitude Journal

quote: If you look to others for fulfillment, you will never truly be fulfilled. If your happiness depends on money, you will never be happy with yourself. Be content with what you have; rejoice in that way things are. When you realize there is nothing lacking, the whole world belongs to you.
author: M.J. Ryan, Attitudes of Gratitude: How to Give and Receive Joy Every Day of Your Life

quote: Gratitude is the appreciation of things that are not deserved, earned or demanded - those wonderful things that we take for granted.
author: Renée Paule

quote: Open your box of blessings and take out something to smile about.
author: Annonymous Doner

quote: If someone treads on my hand accidentally, while trying to help me, the pain may be no less acute than if he treads on it in contemptuous disregard of my existence or with a malevolent wish to injure me. But I shall generally feel in the second case a kind and degree of resentment that I shall not feel in the first. If someone's actions help me to some benefit I desire, then I am benefited in any case; but if he intended them so to benefit me because of his general goodwill towards me, I shall reasonably feel a gratitude which I should not feel at all if the benefit was an accidental consequence unintended or even regretted by him, of some plan of action with a different aim.
author: Peter Frederick Strawson, Freedom and Resentment and Other Essays

quote: I looked around and thought about my life. I felt grateful. I noticed every detail. That is the key to time travel. You can only move if you are actually in the moment. You have to be where you are to get where you need to go.
author: Amy Poehler, Yes Please

quote: Gratitude is a species of love, excited in us by some action of the person for whom we have it, and by which we believe that he has done some good to us, or at least that he has had the intention of doing so. Passions, III, 193. XI, 473-474. Trans. John Morris
author: René Descartes, Passions of the Soul

quote: Nothing in life is yours to keep—not your children, not your friends and family, not your lover, not your material possessions, not your youth and vitality, not your struggles (which is great news) or successes, not your body and not even your life. Everything in life is given to you for a short period of time, to enjoy, to learn from, to appreciate and to love, but never to keep.
author: Luminita D. Saviuc, 15 Things You Should Give Up to Be Happy: An Inspiring Guide to Discovering Effortless Joy
tags: appreciation, gratitude, happiness-life, keep-an-open-mind, letting-go, love-everything, no-attachment

quote: How could you fail to feel uplifted when a voice was telling you at every step that the year, month, day, season, place, even that very moment were blessed?
author: Natalia Sanmartín Fenollera, The Awakening of Miss Prim

quote: Be happy while you live life.
author: Lailah Gifty Akita

quote: Can't couldn't do it and could did it all.
author: Aaron Walker, View from the Top: Living a Life of Significance

quote: Every day, in which you exist on earth, be filled with deep gratitude.
author: Lailah Gifty Akita

quote: She did not even trouble herself much to show Godfrey her gratitude. We may spoil gratitude as we offer it, by insisting on its recognition. To receive honestly is the best thanks for a good thing.
author: George MacDonald, Mary Marston

quote: Gratitude is a powerful trait.
author: Auliq-Ice
tags: acknowledgement, appreciation, credit, gratefulness, gratitude, hat-tip, indebtedness, recognition, regard, respect-sense-of-obligation, thankfulness, thanks

quote: Gratitude gets us through the hard stuff...Gratitude always leaves us looking at God and away from dread.
author: Max Lucado, You'll Get Through This: Hope and Help for Your Turbulent Times

quote: It’s up to us to choose contentment and thankfulness now—and to stop imagining that we have to have everything perfect before we’ll be happy.
author: Joanna Gaines, The Magnolia Story

quote: That was as rough a thing as I ever heard tell of happening to a boy. And I'm mighty proud to learn how my boy stood up to it. You couldn't ask any more of a grown man... It's not a thing you can forget. I don't guess it's a thing you ought to forget. What I mean is, things like that happen. They may seem mighty cruel and unfair, but that's how life is part of the time. But that isn't the only way life is. A part of the time, it's mighty good. And a man can't afford to waste all the good part, worrying about the bad parts. That makes it all bad.
author: Fred Gipson, Old Yeller

quote: Those who are too arrogant to say thank you find boredom in life. They are often depressed, unhappy and lived an empty life.
author: Sesan Kareem

quote: Gratitude unlocks the door of opportunities, blessing, greatness and prosperity. Gratitude is your key to a worthy life.
author: Sesan Kareem

quote: The happiest people on earth are not those who have robust bank accounts, or all the good things in this world; but, they are those who truly embrace the attitude of gratitude. Some of these folks are poor, but are still very grateful for the little they have; for the peace of mind they enjoy, for the love in their lives, for the unity in their family and for all the ordinary things many people take for granted. They always focused, not on the things they are aspiring for, but for all the things God has used to bless their lives.
author: Sesan Kareem

quote: My heart is at ease knowing that what was meant for me will never miss me, and that what misses me was never meant for me.
author: Imam Al-Shafii an 18th century Muslim jurist

quote: I can only see life as this most miserable accident that I have been forced to endure simply because I refuse to see it as the most astounding plan that I have been privileged to engage.
author: Craig D. Lounsbrough
tags: accident, appreciate, appreciation, astounding, gratitude, life, miserable, opportunity, plan, privilege, thankful, thanks, thanksgiving

quote: We cannot fully heal if we cannot experience gratitude on a daily basis.
author: Sharon E. Rainey, The Best Part of My Day Healing Journal

quote: Greed and Lust never say, "Enough!
author: Ron Brackin

quote: Gratitude is what you feel. Thanksgiving is what you do.
author: Timothy J. Keller

quote: Don't let your 'future success' dim the beauty and light that's in front of you right now.
author: Taryn Garland, Love Sum (theLOVESUM.com)

quote: Once we forget those who have contributed time and effort in making an endeavor successful, we forget ourselves.
author: Beem Weeks

quote: Life works with balance. If you give and receive out of giving, you create a balance with life. You serve life, before you expect life to serve you.
author: Roshan Sharma
tags: abundance, balance, give, gratitude, receive, serving, sharing

quote: We are like poor people, who have nothing but each other, and are happy.
author: Mark Helprin, Freddy and Fredericka

quote: When we have loved, that loving part is the best part of any and every day.
author: Sharon E. Rainey, The Best Part of My Day Healing Journal
tags: best-part, best-part-insights, daily-life, day, gratitude, love

quote: Gratitude does not mean the absence of solitude, but the presence of a positive attitude in spite of.
author: Gift Gugu Mona

quote: Sweep away the dirt,Let's get a little messy.Underneath is love.
author: Taryn Garland, Love Sum (theLOVESUM.com)

quote: Gratitude is a way of life. Gratitude is the way home.
author: Angie karan

quote: Cicero said that gratitude is not only the greatest of virtues, but the parent of all others. If that’s true, then my happiness does not cause me to be grateful for what I have. My gratitude for what I have causes me to be happy. Gratitude births the virtue of happiness.
author: Jennifer Dukes Lee, The Happiness Dare: Pursuing Your Heart's Deepest, Holiest, and Most Vulnerable Desire

quote: Aim for happiness because if you keep looking to reach perfection, you're never going to appreciate anything.
author: Karen A. Baquiran

quote: You must understand that it is not in the nature of Man to be grateful. So in whatever you or I do for others we must never expect gratitude. If we do, we will only be disappointed.
author: S R Nathan

quote: An aware heart is a grateful heart.
author: Toni Sorenson, Aligned By Christ

quote: We can never bring anything to us unless we are grateful for what we have. In fact, if somebody were completely and utterly grateful for everything, they would never have to ask for anything, because it would be given to them before they even asked.
author: Rhonda Byrne, How The Secret Changed My Life: Real People. Real Stories.

quote: In the modern world we are surrounded by so much abundance that we cannot see it.
author: Chris Matakas, The Tao of Jiu Jitsu

quote: The true poetic feeling is a feeling of boundless gratitude.
author: Marty Rubin

quote: You can't be passionate about gratitude and be crippled by ingratitude.
author: Bamigboye Olurotimi
tags: god, gratitude, honour, ingratitude, passionate, praise, success

quote: Holding the space for yourself: Embrace the here and now. Embrace the journey. Try not to judge yourself but rather try to accept yourself as you are. Success is measured in staying on the path, not in how many successes or failures you've had along the way. Let gratitude fill your heart, live with love, laugh and enjoy the journey. All of life is a journey.
author: Akiroq Brost

quote: Gratitude washes all of my worries and my stress away.
author: Akiroq Brost

quote: When we accept ourselves for what we are, we decrease our hunger for power or the acceptance of others because our self-intimacy reinforces our inner sense of security. We are no longer preoccupied with being powerful or popular. We no longer fear criticism because we accept the reality of our human limitations. Once integrated, we are less often plagued with the desire to please others because simply being true to ourselves brings lasting peace. We are grateful for life and we deeply appreciate and love ourselves.
author: Brennan Manning, The Ragamuffin Gospel: Good News for the Bedraggled, Beat-Up, and Burnt Out

quote: i thank the universe for takingeverything it has takenand giving to meeverything it is giving-balance
author: Rupi Kaur, Milk and Honey

quote: The word "Eucharist" means literally "act of thanksgiving." To celebrate the Eucharist and to live a Eucharistic life has everything to do with gratitude. Living Eucharistically is living life as a gift, a gift for which one is grateful. But gratitude is not the most obvious response to life, certainly not when we experience life as a series of losses! Still, the great mystery we celebrate in the Eucharist and live in a Eucharistic life is precisely that through mourning our losses we come to know life as a gift.
author: Henri J.M. Nouwen, With Burning Hearts: A Meditation on the Eucharistic Life

quote: Don't waste all today worrying about the possible mistakes you may have made yesterday. You don't know what will happen tomorrow or how long we have here, so enjoy what you have today since you have it. May you be thankful for today and live it to the fullest as it truly is a gift
author: Angie karan
tags: angie-karan-quote, grateful, gratitude, life, may-you-be-thankful-for-today, mistakes, worry

quote: If any writer in this country has collected as fine and passionate a group of readers as I have, they’re fortunate and lucky beyond anyone’s imagination. It remains a shock to me that I’ve had a successful writing career. Not someone like me; Lord, there were too many forces working against me, too many dark currents pushing against me, but it somehow worked. Though I wish I’d written a lot more, been bolder with my talent, more forgiving of my weaknesses, I’ve managed to draw a magic audience into my circle. They come to my signings to tell me stories, their stories. The ones that have hurt them and made their nights long and their lives harder.
author: Pat Conroy, A Lowcountry Heart: Reflections on a Writing Life
tags: authors, fortunate, gratitude, pat-conroy, readers-and-writers, writing

quote: Those who complain much get little, those who complain little get much.
author: Jeanette Coron

quote: To have attracted readers is the most magical part of my writing life. I was not expecting you to show up when I wrote my first books. It took me by surprise. It filled me with gratitude. It still does.
author: Pat Conroy, A Lowcountry Heart: Reflections on a Writing Life

quote: The teachers of my life saved my life and sent me out prepared for whatever life I was meant to lead. Like everyone else, I had some bad ones and mediocre ones, but I never had one that I thought was holding me back because of idleness or thoughtlessness. They spent their lives with the likes of me and I felt safe during the time they spent with me. The best of them made me want to be just like them. I wanted young kids to look at me the way I looked at the teachers who loved me. Loving them was not difficult for a boy like me. They lit a path for me, and one that I followed with joy.
author: Pat Conroy, A Lowcountry Heart: Reflections on a Writing Life
tags: gratitude, love, pat-conroy, student, teachers, teaching

quote: My career still strikes me as miraculous. That a boy raised on Marine bases in the South, taught by Roman Catholic nuns in backwater Southern towns that loathed Catholics, and completed his education with an immersion into The Citadel—the whole story sounds fabricated, impossible even to me. Maybe especially to me.
author: Pat Conroy, A Lowcountry Heart: Reflections on a Writing Life

quote: I believe we can choose Love and gratitude, or choose Other Than. Those are our options, and in the end, there’s only one option.
author: Kelly Corbet, Already Here: The Matter of Love

quote: Gratitude is a “nice” habit to adopt, warming your heart and all, but the Kumbaya effect is just the beginning. Gratefulness goes wayyyyyyy beyond the momentary feeling good, offering plenty of long-term and “practical” benefits we may never have intuited.
author: Kelly Corbet, Already Here: The Matter of Love

quote: Every occasion is an opportunity to glorify God.
author: Lailah Gifty Akita

quote: I make a point to appreciate all the little things in my life. I go out and smell the air after a good, hard rain. I re-read passages from my favorite books. I hold the little treasures that somebody special gave me. These small actions help remind me that there are so many great, glorious pieces of good in the world.
author: Dolly Parton, Dream More

quote: When your heart aligns with the truth of its energy, GRATITUDE sings your name, LOVE flows freely, and every bit of your being is awakened, breathing and moving in perfect HARMONY.
author: Angie karan
tags: awakening, energy, flow, gratitude, harmony, love, when-your-heart-aligns

quote: Life is both beautiful and painful. In whatever situation we find ourselves in, no matter how unfortunate it may seem, there is always something to be thankful for – if we only choose to see it.
author: Frederick Espiritu, The Path to Awesomeness: Becoming Super, Being Human

quote: Never let the things you want make you forget the things you have.
author: Sanchita Pandey, Voyage to Happiness!
tags: contentment, gratitude, happiness, satisfaction, voyage-to-happiness, want

quote: Can you be grateful for everything? No. But in every moment.
author: David Steindl-Rast

quote: They have to leave their mark. They can't just watch. They can't just appreciate. They can't just fit into the natural order. They have to make something unnatural happen. That is the scientist's job, and now we have whole societies that try to be scientific... We've had four hundred years of modern science, and we ought to know by now what it's good for, and what it's not good for. It's time for a change.
author: Michael Crichton, Jurassic Park

quote: [One} who does not know when a gift has made him safe is poorer than a slug, even though he may think otherwise himself.
author: Richard Adams, Watership Down

quote: May your heart be filled with gladness.
author: Lailah Gifty Akita

quote: Your father... doesn't work late for you to pinch his dinner.
author: Susan Cooper, Silver on the Tree

quote: Open for sun, closed for rain, that's the poor man's weathervane.
author: Susan Cooper, Silver on the Tree

quote: Gratitude is the seed of gladness.
author: Lailah Gifty Akita
tags: gladness, gratitude, inspirational, life, thank-you, thanksgiving, wisdom-of-lailah-gifty-akita

quote: Peace starts within. We are what we give.
author: Sal Di Leo

quote: The Story Of Your Life: The world and everyone you meet will not revolve around you. You're not always going to get what you want. You are going to make compromises every single day. You're going to get smacked down a time or two, or three, or fifty. Throwing tantrums, sitting in the corner pouting and crying over what you didn't get that you wanted isn't going to help you get it. Likewise, pissing and moaning to other people about it all being so unfair. We're all in the same boat, my friends. You can chose to sit in the corner and sulk your life away, crying about the unfairness of it all, bemoaning how everyone is making you miserable, or you can do just the opposite. You can stand up and BE GRATEFUL for everything you do have. You can look back and see how many obstacles you've already overcome, realizing that with each conquest you've become a stronger person. You can realize that your happiness is not and should never be dependent on other people. None of us is going to get out of this Story alive, dear reader. Make the best of the time you have. Make a positive difference. Make your own happily ever after.
author: Pamela Morris

quote: Gratitude opens our eyes… We are often praying for something God has already given us.
author: Steve Maraboli

quote: Charlie Brown: A penny! Rats! Why couldn't I have found a nickel? What good is a penny these days? Why do things like that always happen to me?! *walks off frustrated*Lucy: Gee, he found a penny! Why don't things like that ever happen to me?
author: Charles M. Schulz, The Complete Peanuts, Vol. 1: 1950-1952

quote: Gratitude is an antidote to negative emotions, a neutralizer of envy, hostility, worry, and irritation. It is savoring; it is not taking things for granted; it is present oriented.
author: Sonja Lyubomirsky, The How of Happiness: A Scientific Approach to Getting the Life You Want

quote: Be grateful for all ordeals, they are the shortest way to the Divine.
author: The Mother, Words of the Mother - II

quote: Happiness begins with gratitude." ~ Dr. MaryAnn Diorio
author: Dr. MaryAnn Diorio

quote: When the people of our hills visit an individual for any particular purpose, as for instance to show their gratitude or to express their thanks, it is customary for them not to go on their mission empty handed.A rose, a marigold, or a few petals of either flower, suffices, and the gift is proffered in hands cupped together.
author: Jim Corbett, The Man-Eating Leopard of Rudraprayag

quote: This morning I woke up before the alarm clock went off and the sky outside was a big red ocean. You're beautiful when you're sleeping so I spent an hour observing the way you breathe. Inhale, exhale, without a thought of tomorrow. The window was open and the air was so crisp and I couldn't imagine how to ever ask for more than this.
author: Charlotte Eriksson, Empty Roads & Broken Bottles; in search for The Great Perhaps
tags: book-quotes, breathe, gratitude, love, morning, mornings, peacefulness, pink, sky, sleeping, sunrise, waking-up, window

quote: Ingratitude is a crime more despicable than revenge, which is only returning evil for evil, while ingratitude returns evil for good.
author: William George Jordan

quote: Cultivate and nurture being grateful for every good thing that comes to you, and to give thanks continuously. Remembering that In daily life we must see that it is not happiness that makes us grateful, but gratefulness that makes us happy.﻿
author: Angie karan
tags: angie-karan-quotes, cultivate, grateful, gratefulness, gratitude, life, thank-you

quote: When you appreciate what you have, and feel enthusiasm for life, you move in the direction of your natural state i.e. happy & peaceful.
author: Hina Hashmi, Your Life A Practical Guide to Happiness Peace and Fulfilment

quote: What are you grateful for? Get in the habit of being grateful, even for a small thing. It opens up your energy for positivity and blessings to flow to you.
author: Eileen Anglin

quote: Thank God, the greatest things are freely giving; life, love, joy, smiles, hugs, inner peace, blessings, family, friends, nature….!
author: Lailah Gifty Akita
tags: abundant-life, god, gratitude, living-well, motivationa, sharing

quote: Gratitude is an open a heaven blessings!
author: Lailah Gifty Akita

quote: We thrive with thankfulness.
author: Lailah Gifty Akita

quote: How has Paul kept his wonder? He never forgot who he had been.
author: Beth Moore, To Live Is Christ

quote: What could make a man stands taller than a newborn son?
author: Beth Moore, To Live Is Christ

quote: Nothing's more gratifying than to get a heart-felt 'Thank you' !
author: Saurabh Singal

quote: I have what I need. This is enough.
author: Lailah Gifty Akita

quote: Belittling nostalgia is a frightened man's parlor trick. Be grateful for any prize. Even a paper fortress, albeit briefly, provides shelter from the rain.
author: Amy Koppelman, Hesitation Wounds

quote: You can't believe what a lovely planet we have until you see her from outside.
author: Robert A. Heinlein, Have Space Suit—Will Travel

quote: In my life, John has been the epitome of gratitude, and not just because he responds to every meal as if it were the best he'd ever eaten. Throughout the many years of our friendship I have learned that John lives on the breath of gratitude and his response is always celebratory. If an exclamation point had arms and legs, its name would be John.
author: Mary Morrell, Things My Father Taught Me About Love

quote: Spurgeon challenges us to go to the river of our experience, to pull up bulrushes, and to place them in the Ark of our memory, experiencing again the wonder that allowed our infant faith to flourish.
author: Charles Haddon Spurgeon, Morning and Evening, Based on the English Standard Version

quote: They have no imagination. A tail is just a tail to them, just a little something extra in the back.
author: A.A. Milne, Winnie-the-Pooh

quote: On the off-chance you won't live forever, maybe you should try being happy now.
author: Janice Kaplan, The Gratitude Diaries: How a Year Looking on the Bright Side Can Transform Your Life

quote: You glorify God with gratitude.
author: Corey M.K. Hughes

quote: They chose to regard it as a miraculous preservation.
author: E.M. Forster, A Room with a View

quote: The more grateful you are, the more you attract things to be grateful for.
author: James Altucher, The Rich Employee

quote: Such is the dilemma of the atheist. Who to thank? It’s a terrible condition, to feel one’s heart swelling with the wonders of our world and yet have nobody to thank for it. It makes a man feel thwarted.
author: Janet Turpin Myers, the last year of confusion
tags: atheism-there-is-a-god, gratitude, gratitude-for-natural-wonders, wonders, wonders-of-creation, wonders-of-life

quote: It's amazing how the more thankful I am, the more things I get to be thankful for.

quote: Gratitude can't grow love higher than regret.
author: Shannon L. Alder

quote: The United States is a successful nation that is constantly susceptible to melancholy because things are not perfect.
author: George F. Will, The Woven Figure: Conservatism and America's Fabric

quote: A big wind came up and I hoped a storm would break the heat. But it just blew alot of dust around, and at sunset we had to bar doors and windows against mosquitoes. Itdidn’t do much for our comfort level, but—here’s where the Chemin takes you—we weregrateful. We were grateful because we had (albeit narrowly) escaped heatstroke; becausethe shelter, though unbelievably hot, was clean and quiet; and most of all, because it sleptsix but we had it to ourselves. No people to deal with at the end of your (and their)tether; no sodden bathrooms. No snoring. Pilgrim camaraderie was all very well, butsometimes it was too damn much.
author: Denise Fainberg, Walking Through Sunflowers: Through Deepest France on the Road to Compostela

quote: All glory to the Adonai!
author: Lailah Gifty Akita, Pearls of  Wisdom: Great  mind

quote: Those who are not grateful soon begin to complain of everything.

quote: Have the wisdom to perceive all there is to be thankful for, and then be thankful for the wisdom to perceive things so clearly.
author: Richelle E. Goodrich

quote: Oh what marvels fill me with thanksgiving!The deep mahogany of a leaf once green. The feathered fronds of tiny icicles coating every twig and branch in a wintry landscape. The feel of goosebumps thawing after endured frozen temperatures. Both hands clamped around a hot mug of herbal tea. The aromatic whiff of mint under my nose. The stir of emotion from a child's cry for mommy. A gift of love detached of strings. Spotted lilies collecting raindrops in a cupped clump of petals. The vibrant mélange of colors on butterfly wings. The milky luster of a single pearl. Rainbows reflecting off iridescence bubbles. Awe-struck silence evoked by any form of beauty.Avocado flecks in your eyes.Warm hands on my face.Sweetness on the tongue.The harmony of voices.An answered prayer.A pink balloon.A caress.A smile.More.These have become my treasures by virtue of thanksgiving.
author: Richelle E. Goodrich, Slaying Dragons
tags: blessings, gratitude, richelle, richelle-e-goodrich, richelle-goodrich, thankfulness, thanks, thanksgiving, thanksgiving-quotes

quote: If I spend every moment, for the rest of my days, thanking God for all his goodness to us, that would still not be enough.

quote: Thanksgiving is not only being aware of the abundance of good in the world but embracing it.

author: Debasish Mridha

quote: When you accept discomfort of whatever moment that you are in. The power of that surrender, that letting go of desiring to be in a different situation than the one your in.........will set you free from the hell of your unconscious.
author: Matthew Donnelly

quote: I do not know how to thank you.''I can tell you,' said Obierika. 'Kill one of your sons for me.''That will not be enough,' said Okonkwo.'Then kill yourself,' said Obierika.
author: Chinua Achebe, Things Fall Apart

quote: The path to enlightenment is when you allow presence, love and gratitude to overlap your ego.
author: Matthew Donnelly

quote: The more emphasis we put on wanting things to change, the more unpeaceful we will be. The more emphasis we put on accepting and having gratitude for 'What is' the closer we are to arriving at Nirvana.

quote: Don't get caught in the trap of always "Needing" something. Needing something always projects your mind into the future as if you have it and is the opposite of gratitude. Be content in the present moment.
author: Matthew Donnelly

quote: Sacred life ,sacred-gratitude.
author: Lailah Gifty Akita, Think Great: Be Great!
tags: gratitude, life, sacred, spirituality, thank-you, wisdom-of-lailah-gifty-akita

quote: The person I'm most thankful for this Thanksgiving is Lieutenant Eve Dallas. She kept me safe when I was scared and I was sad. She took me to her house with Roarke and Summerset and Galahad so nobody could hurt me, not even the bad people who killed my family and my friend. She told me the truth. She promised me she would find the bad people and make sure they were punished. And Roarke said she would never stop until she did that. He told me the truth too. She helped me find Richard and Elizabeth and Kevin. They're not my mother, my father, and my brother. But they're my family now, and I know it's okay to love them. It doesn't mean I don't love my mom and dad and my brother. Dallas didn't treat me like a baby. She told me I was a survivor, and that's important. She worked hard, and she even got hurt, but she found the bad people, and she made sure they got punished. She told me the truth. She kept her promise. So she is the person I'm most thankful for this Thanksgiving. Nixie Swisher.
author: J.D. Robb, Thankless in Death

quote: Were there no God, we would be in this glorious world with grateful hearts, and no one thank.
author: Christina Rossetti

quote: Be grateful for every moment and every breath.

quote: The fight for joy is first and always a fight to see.

quote: Life is truly too short to not be HAPPY and GRATEFUL today.

quote: What is the path to wholeness? We will see this path more clearly if we recognize that greed’s ugly stepsister is ungratefulness. Greed always wants more. When we are greedy, we are never satisfied. Whatever we receive from others, we conclude we deserve. And in whatever quantity it may come, it is never enough. Lack of gratitude is a manifestation of an abundance of greed. From the vantage point of the taker, it is his or her justification for always demanding. He is endlessly disappointed in others. No one ever comes through for him. No one ever keeps his promises. Everyone always falls short of his expectations. There is no need for thanks, except thanks for nothing. No truth, no matter how profound, will find its way into a heart that is absent of gratitude.
author: Erwin Raphael McManus, Uprising: A Revolution of the Soul

quote: Gratitude is a divine emotion. It fills the heart, not to bursting; it warms it, but not to fever. I like to taste leisurely of bliss. Devoured in haste, I do not know its flavor.

quote: No one can become and remain a theologian unless he is compelled again and again to be astonished at himself.

quote: Gratitude is a blessed act.

quote: He was fortified by a memory which kept only the good things and rejected the ill. Despite his sorrows, he had had a fair share of joys and these were ever fresh and accessible.

quote: Road accidents, psycho killings, plane crashes abound - we don't know which day will be our last, so why not make today the happiest day and be thankful for all that we have?

quote: It is so easy to thank people," said Mma Ramotswe, passing the letter over to Mma Makutsi, "and most people don't bother to do it. They don't thank the person who does something for them. They just take it for granted.

quote: There is no such thing as gratitude unexpressed. If it is unexpressed, it is plain, old-fashioned ingratitude.

quote: It's a privilege to love someone, to truly love them; and while it's paradisaical if she or he loves you back, it's unfair to demand or expect reciprocity. Love is the only game in which we win even when we lose.

quote: The power of the bleeding love of God is stronger than the power of Caesar, of the law, of Mars, Mammon, Aphrodite and the rest. This is the point that Paul grasped. And that is the reason for the Colossians' gratitude. The battle has been won.

quote: Like gratitude, authentic appreciation in the workplace is a realisation that can be nurtured and accessed with daily mindful practice. There is increasing evidence that a grateful mindset amplifies happiness and mental and emotional wellbeing.

quote: I want to cultivate a deep sense of gratitude, of groundedness, of enough, even while I’m longing for something more. The longing and the gratitude, both. quote: Before I go to sleep tonight; I will speak a nice prayer, I will let my worries leave my mind as silence fills the air. If I have a bed; to curl between the sheets, I am an inch more blessed; than the man, on the street. If I have a love to cuddle; in the comfort of my home, I am grateful, I still have their presence to tell them, I love them so. If I have healthy eyes, that I can choose to close; I am grateful for my sight, because some will never know. If I have a voice & glistening ears to listen; Than in all my glory, I am grateful for this livin' All that really matters; is what, most don't have the courage to see, Who you became; from the day of your birth, the dash and the final chapter that makes your story complete.

quote: It was gratitude; gratitude, not merelyfor having once loved her, but for loving her still well enough to forgive all the petulance and acrimony of her manner in rejecting him.

quote: The most fortunate are those who have a wonderful capacity to appreciate again and again, freshly and naively, the basic goods of life, with awe, pleasure, wonder and even ecstasy.

quote: He thought about his long life and gave thanks for all the bounty and joy that he had been given. To want more, to wish for yet more, he knew, would be petty. He sighed happily, and listened to the wind sweeping down from the mountains, to the chirping of night birds.

quote: If we want to change what happens, we change what we believe and expect.

quote: Count every second of your life as the greatest blessing.

quote: Thank you Father for another day, for another week, for another month and for another year. Your grace is sufficient for me.

quote: Think back. How many of your sweetest dreams, your greatest hopes, your most cherished desires have come true?On the other hand, how much of what you didn't really care about wound up happening anyway?What you have to understand is that it's the god of solitude who also happens to be in charge of denying us what we desperately want.She does it because she believes the more we get what we desperately want, the more miserable we become, even more so than we already are.As Truman Capote put it, "More tears are shed for answered prayers than unanswered
author: Lionel Fisher, Celebrating Time Alone: Stories Of Splendid Solitude

quote: Gratitude should run through our veins, it should reside in us, it should live in our bones as long we live.

quote: GIVE THANKS - GET HAPPY
author: Jane Park Smith

quote: The more we express thanks, the more gratitude we feel. The more gratitude we feel, the more we express thanks. It's circular, and it leads to a happier life.

quote: Gratitude magnifies the sweet parts of life and diminishes the painful ones.
author: Yuval Levin

quote: When complimented, a sincere "thank you" is the only response required.
author: H. Jackson Brown Jr.

quote: Much of the oxygen we breathe comes from plants that died long ago. We can give thanks to these ancestors of our present-pay foliage, but we can't give back to them. We can, however, give forward. When we are unable to return the favor, we can pay it forward to someone or something else. Using this approach, we can see ourselves as part of a larger flow of giving and receiving throughout time. Receiving from the past, we can give to the future. When tackling issues such as climate change, the stance of gratitude is a refreshing alternative to guilt or fear as a source of motivation.
author: Joanna Macy & Chris Johnstone

quote: There is no prescription for finding moments of gratitude in every day
author: there is simply the choice.
tags: Gillian Deacon, Naked Imperfection: A Memoir

quote: She doesn't acknowledge Tucker, and there's no thank you for the cigarettes. She says a person shows their gratitude by action, not by words. So I guess that means she thanks me by smoking every cigarette in every pack.

quote: Once I thought it delightful and astonishing to find a present so big that it only went halfway into the stocking. Now I am delighted and astonished every morning to find a present so big that it takes two stockings to hold it, and then leaves a great deal outside; it is the large and preposterous present of myself.
author: G.K. Chesterton

quote: We all feel better when we are grateful. There is great wisdom in understanding that no matter the situation, there is always something for which we can choose to be grateful.

quote: The shortest road man walks, is sadly the road of gratitude!

quote: Thank God I was hit by a truck. It seems that God was trying to get my attention for years but I was so stubborn it took knocking me square out of my body to see him for myself. Next time I will be way more specific when I ask for help to slow me down.

quote: If you do believe in God, and your first instinct in all things must be gratitude: for creation, or love, for mercy.

quote: Being Happy on Purpose is about making a conscious decision in each moment to move towards happiness. It is not about a perfect life. It is not about having things. author: Jennifer Sparks, Happy on Purpose
tags: gratitude, happiness, happiness-plan, happy, inspiration, life-change, self-help

quote: I look back upon my youth and realize how so many people gave me help, understanding, courage – very important things to me – and they never knew it. They entered into my life and became powers within me. All of us live spiritually by what others have given us, often unwittingly, in the significant hours of our life. At the time these significant hours may not even be perceived. We may not recognize them until years later when we look back, as one remembers some long-ago music or a boyhood landscape. We all owe to others much of the gentleness and wisdom that we have made our own; and we may well ask ourselves what will others owe to us.

quote: If you learn to develop an abundant mentality you will not be envious of others, you will celebrate their successes, you share in their joys and pains; don't see life as a competition but a complimentary.

quote: Gratitude is the bridge that merges your love with longevity. It is the vital ingredient for a lasting relationship.
author: Steve Maraboli

quote: Feeling grateful is good
author: showing appreciation to those you feel grateful to is sublime.

quote: You need to be able to find hope in your circumstances. We need it for ourselves and our children.
